story:
It's the Right Time


Why? Because this is about YOU, and YOU, and HIM, and HER, and me too!

My name is Adriane Ullman.  I have a bachelor's degree in Education.  I was married to the military for twelve years. I have owned two businesses, one in real estate investment, and the other was a vintage home decor shop.  I have two sons, one wants to go to the Air Force Academy, and the other, my youngest who has autism, has just come through a very scary bout of depression and anxiety.  In fact, we have both recovered from these debilitating conditions by treating our mind, body, and spirits.  The holistic treatments that my son and I received changed our lives and made us appreciate every minute!After our recovery, I had the option to follow several career paths.  But I wanted to give people the gift that I received.  So, Destination U was born.  It is a place that anyone can come and feel most welcome the second they walk through the door. 

  • We offer a multitude of classes 
  • Group therapy sessions for pain, depression, anxiety, parenting autism
  • Meditation, yoga,
  •  Art therapy
  •  Massage therapy
  •  Nutritionist
  • Natural healing products.   


The goal is to have four full time therapists working with us.  Down the road, we will offer nutritional lunches and have a physician on the team, offer pet therapy, a spiritual book club, and Life Coaching!  My sons will be working with me as a cashier and helping lead a group session for teens with autism.  



Destination U is the only holistic wellness center in Northwest Louisiana.  I know the extreme importance and magnitude of what we are doing.  We will help thousands live happier lives.  I have great Faith that I am not doing this alone, and I need the help of many.  We are starting small.  The things we need are tiny in comparison to the great things that are happening, but we do still need them to get going.  So, I want to thank you for helping us help so many others!



What We Need & What You Get

What we need to be fully operational (we are already having classes and group sessions) are materials for our therapy sessions such as:

  • art supplies and tables for art therapy
  • good head phones, a xylophone and drums for music therapy
  • yoga/meditation mats
  • essential oils for aromatherapy
  • We also need to stock our shelves with high quality products for the clients, such as pure essential oils, supplements, healthy snacks, healing books, candles, music, and body care products.
  • a booking system for our website that allows us to handle all the scheduling for our therapists

And lastly, we need to upgrade our facilities by getting:

  • a refrigerator for healthy snacks
  • lighting for outside our door since we have nighttime classes
  • a sink in the massage therapist's room
  • a lit sign to promote the business.

Destination U Has Super Cool Perks for You!



  • Enjoy three bottles of your favorite scent of high quality, pure Essential Oils! The lavender helps me sleep better every night! There is also Peace for relaxation, Motivate to get you up and moving, Deep Blue for muscle and joint soreness, Peppermint, Bergamot, and many, many more.
  • A compilation of music that is therapy by just listening! Sound waves are everywhere.  Our bodies produce certain chemicals for certain sounds.  Our high tech music products can stimulate dopamine and other chemicals naturally that relaxes us.
  • A painting by one of our most improved art therapy clients, with their handwritten story of success. With your permission, we'll post the story on Facebook with your name as someone who made it all possible!
  • An online session with our well-respected Licensed Marriage and Family Counselor. He has interviewed many of the most respected Spiritual Teachers out there.  He does Kineseology, Hypnosis, and many other forms of therapy.
  • An online session with our certified Life Purpose Coach.  She will help you find your deep, true, inner passion and purpose for your life.
  • A gift for a loved one of five essential oils, a diffuser, and a guide on how to use the oils for optimal support.  It will be wrapped and sent with a card to the address of your choosing!! Talk about sweet!



What will we do with the funds if we don't reach our goal?

We have prioritized our list to safety first (the lighting), therapy materials second, and products third.  Then we will work toward the rest from there.

The Impact

Our mission is to bring people together to help them achieve wellness.  Not only are we helping therapists connect with clients, providing jobs, exposure, and security in numbers.  We will also help so many,like my son and I, be more productive, happy citizens that feed positive energy into our world.  It's the ripple effect.  We'll help them, and they'll pay it forward!



I saw this time and time again when I was teaching inner city middle schoolers.  My students felt love and respect from me.  Then, they would do community service projects, and it always helped THEM the most.


As a business, we have to get several irons in the fire to pay the bills and grow.  We can help thousands, but with no income, it will not last.  But I know if we have several high quality professionals paying the overhead, therapy sessions that bring in money and healing that keeps people coming back, and great products that people stop in to buy, we can be very successful.  


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    • Please share our vision with others.
    • You can do this by using the Indiegogo share tools!

    Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!!
story_txt:
It's the Right Time
Why? Because this is about YOU, and YOU, and HIM, and HER, and me too!My name is Adriane Ullman.  I have a bachelor's degree in Education.  I was married to the military for twelve years. I have owned two businesses, one in real estate investment, and the other was a vintage home decor shop.  I have two sons, one wants to go to the Air Force Academy, and the other, my youngest who has autism, has just come through a very scary bout of depression and anxiety.  In fact, we have both recovered from these debilitating conditions by treating our mind, body, and spirits.  The holistic treatments that my son and I received changed our lives and made us appreciate every minute!After our recovery, I had the option to follow several career paths.  But I wanted to give people the gift that I received.  So, Destination U was born.  It is a place that anyone can come and feel most welcome the second they walk through the door.  
We offer a multitude of classes  

Group therapy sessions for pain, depression, anxiety, parenting autism 

Meditation, yoga,
 Art therapy
 Massage therapy
 Nutritionist
Natural healing products.    





The goal is to have four full time therapists working with us.  Down the 
road, we will offer nutritional lunches and have a physician on the 
team, offer pet therapy, a spiritual book club, and Life Coaching!  My sons will be working with me as a cashier and helping lead a 
group session for teens with autism.  




Destination U is the only holistic wellness center in Northwest Louisiana.  I know the extreme importance and magnitude of what we are doing.  We will help thousands live happier lives.  I have great Faith that I am not doing this alone, and I need the help of many.  We are starting small.  The things we need are tiny in comparison to the great things that are happening, but we do still need them to get going.  So, I want to thank you for helping us help so many others!

 
What We Need & What You GetWhat we need to be fully operational (we are already having classes and group sessions) are materials for our therapy sessions such as: 
art supplies and tables for art therapy
good head phones, a xylophone and drums for music therapy
yoga/meditation mats 

essential oils for aromatherapy
We also need to stock our shelves with high quality products for the clients, such as pure essential oils, supplements, healthy snacks, healing books, candles, music, and body care products. 

a booking system for our website that allows us to handle all the scheduling for our therapists


 And lastly, we need to upgrade our facilities by getting:

a refrigerator for healthy snacks
lighting for outside our door since we have nighttime classes
a sink in the massage therapist's room
a lit sign to promote the business.


Destination U Has Super Cool Perks for You!

Enjoy three bottles of your favorite scent of high quality, pure Essential Oils! The lavender helps me sleep better every night! There is also Peace for relaxation, Motivate to get you up and moving, Deep Blue for muscle and joint soreness, Peppermint, Bergamot, and many, many more.

A compilation of music that is therapy by just listening! Sound waves are everywhere.  Our bodies produce certain chemicals for certain sounds.  Our high tech music products can stimulate dopamine and other chemicals naturally that relaxes us.

A painting by one of our most improved art therapy clients, with their handwritten story of success. With your permission, we'll post the story on Facebook with your name as someone who made it all possible!

An online session with our well-respected Licensed Marriage and Family Counselor. He has interviewed many of the most respected Spiritual Teachers out there.  He does Kineseology, Hypnosis, and many other forms of therapy.

An online session with our certified Life Purpose Coach.  She will help you find your deep, true, inner passion and purpose for your life.

A gift for a loved one of five essential oils, a diffuser, and a guide on how to use the oils for optimal support.  It will be wrapped and sent with a card to the address of your choosing!! Talk about sweet!






What will we do with the funds if we don't reach our goal?
We have prioritized our list to safety first (the lighting), therapy materials second, and products third.  Then we will work toward the rest from there.
The Impact 

Our mission is to bring people together to help them achieve wellness.  Not only are we helping therapists connect with clients, providing jobs, exposure, and security in numbers.  We will also help so many,like my son and I, be more productive, happy citizens that feed positive energy into our world.  It's the ripple effect.  We'll help them, and they'll pay it forward! 




I saw this time and time again when I was teaching inner city middle schoolers.  My students felt love and respect from me.  Then, they would do community service projects, and it always helped THEM the most. 

As a business, we have to get several irons in the fire to pay the bills and grow.  We can help thousands, but with no income, it will not last.  But I know if we have several high quality professionals paying the overhead, therapy sessions that bring in money and healing that keeps people coming back, and great products that people stop in to buy, we can be very successful.       Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Please share our vision with others.
 You can do this by using the Indiegogo share tools!   Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!!

story:
Short Summary

A few weeks after giving birth to my first child in 2013, I was still disoriented in my own body.  The postpartum experience was humbling for me on so many levels.  Not only was this new body of mine completely foreign, but I really thought I should know how to bounce back to my old athletic self.  Even worse, I’m an experienced physical therapist, specialty board certified in orthopedics.  Shouldn’t I, of all people, know how to recover after having a baby?  

The art, science, and soul of my beloved profession of physical therapy is rooted in getting people to move, to heal, to optimize performance, to restore function, and to prevent injury. 

That's when it hit me.  If I need help sorting out exercise after pregnancy (and I'm supposed to know those kinds of answers), so does everybody else.  As I began to sift through the research, three things immediately became clear:

1.  Exercise after pregnancy has been thoroughly researched, from every angle including breastfeeding, fatigue, and biomechanics.  The answers are available - they're just buried in medical journals.

2. Exercise after pregnancy is incredibly important.  This goes way beyond fitting into your pre-pregnancy jeans.  Exercise in the first year of pregnancy has an effect on mom's fitness level and health for decades to follow.  It's important for mom's day-to-day physical, emotional, and mental wellbeing.  And it's important for baby's future exercise habits and long term health.  Exercise after pregnancy helps mom to function, prevents injuries, optimizes athleticism, and simply makes life healthier for both mom and baby.

3.  Exercise after pregnancy is complex, yet under-emphasized by the medical community.  Exercise is complex on its own.  Add breastfeeding, postpartum hormonal changes, vaginal tearing, diastasis recti, C-section precautions, and the musculoskeletal injuries that can occur during and after childbirth, and that's bringing the complexity to a level no sleep-deprived new mom should have to navigate alone.  We medical professionals have done our research, sure, but we haven't communicated the findings to moms.  For some reason, we leave it to Pinterest and Instagram.  That needs to change. 

The Mission

Everymom Athletics seeks to reach moms all over the world with the research-based information they need to get back to or start exercising after pregnancy.    

Each exercise program with Everymom Athletics starts with the type of delivery, and with a physician or midwife's permission the program begins the day after coming home from the hospital (detailed permission packets for the physician or midwife are available as printables to make it easy for everyone).  There's even help for moms who had a baby years ago.  

The new website will also feature up to date information about exercise gear, instructional videos for core muscle testing, exercise with a baby carrier or stroller, and diastasis recti testing.  

For moms with pelvic floor problems, including incontinence and pelvic pain, there will be a growing resource database for physical therapists around the country (and world) who can help, including how to reach them. 

What We Need & What You Get

The cost for the new website is $3400.  Any contribution will help.  

Everyone who visits EverymomAthletics.com will have open access to everything they need to get started with their post-pregnancy exercise plan, including: 

  • Research-based information about exercise after pregnancy
  • A step-by-step exercise progression (Levels 1-3 of the main exercise progression, post C-section, and recovery from bed/rest or multiples) and the accompanying printables and videos
  • A post-pregnancy walking progression
  • Exercise prescription packets for their physician or midwife
  • Access to a resource hub for connecting with a local physical therapist
  • Resources for exercising solo or with other moms

Perks for contributors include (depending upon contribution amount):

  • A special access code for full access to the site, which includes the advanced (Levels 4-10) exercise progressions, videos, and printables, as well as the running and stroller running progressions.
  • The e-book for Healthy and Quick & Everything Fit, A Step-by-Step Guide to Exercise After Pregnancy 
  • A hardcopy of the book, Healthy and Quick & Everything Fit, A Step-by-Step Guide to Exercise After Pregnancy
  • A place of honor on our "Contributors" page.   

The Impact

New moms are so busy focusing on taking care of their baby.  By making research-based exercise and information easily accessible, we can make a difference for each mom and her baby.  Healthier moms and healthier babies make a healthier world. 

Risks & Challenges

Setting up the website is in the works now.  One of the major challenges is finding all of the physical therapists who offer services specifically geared towards mothers, whether it's in the form of community outreach programs or individual evaluation and treatment.  As this campaign and the website grow, and with your help in spreading the word, we aim to reach as many physical therapists as possible to post their contact information on the site and make it easier for moms to find them.  You can visit the current site at www.postpartumathlete.com.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help with funding the new website, you can help by letting your favorite mom friends know about this new resource and sharing this project with your friends.  They'll be so glad you did!

story:
Meet Bear Soles: Stay cozy and warm this winter

The Problem

The sole of your foot has over 200,000 nerve endings in it, one of the highest concentrations anywhere in the body. And in the winter, the ground can be up to 10 degrees colder than air temperature.

Keeping your feet warm has the highest impact on keeping the rest of your body warm.

The Solution

Adding a sheepskin layer to the bottom of your shoes works much like the insulation you may find in your home. Cold air is kept out. A microclimate is created around your skin that retains the body’s natural temperature. When designing Bear Soles, we made sure that no detail went unnoticed. 

In addition to using the finest natural wool for warmth, we also focused on creating support and durability.

It’s made of natural, fine grain, Australian sheepskin. One of the softest and most indulgent available on the market today.

Easy to Use - It's simple: Bear Soles are inserted into the shoe, replacing your current shoe insoles. Bear Soles fit best in boots and most casual footwear with removable insoles.

Natural anti-bacterial and anti-fungal - This material is able to naturally repel the growth of fungus and bacteria and promote a healthy environment in your shoes.

Temperature Regulating - Sheepskin is an amazing material with temperature regulating properties. This means that your feet will stay warm in cold weather and won't overheat while indoors.

Shock Absorbing - Bear Soles are durable and shock absorbing. Our proprietary foams help to disperse harmful vibrations that are commonly experienced when walking on hard surfaces.

Arch support - Bear Soles also have a supportive, contoured design. Which means they’re engineered to help with things like posture, alignment and arch support. They help with over-pronation which is the leading cause of plantar fasciitis.

Grooved Base Design - Helps to keep Bear Soles stable inside your shoes.

Cleaning Bear Soles

If you see your Bear Soles beginning to get dirty, simply remove them from your shoes and treat the wool with a brush or comb. You can also use a spray bottle to put on a light application of water before brushing the fur. Bear Soles are very easy to clean.

Sustainability: Thoughtful Design, Materials & Process

At Bear Soles we have a commitment to animal welfare. We only source sheepskin from farmers that raise sheep in an ethical and humane way. We're also using recycled rubber foam and sustainably harvested natural cork. We tracked the origins of our materials and found farmers and manufacturers with integrity.

All orders will ship in January & February 2017!

Sizing Chart

Bear Soles are full-length insoles that span 1.5 sizes per pair to accommodate variations in industry shoe sizes. You may need to trim your insoles to fit your footwear. We will collect all sizing info at the conclusion of the campaign. See our sizing below.

The Bear Soles Team

We are a group of active people who love developing products. Along with our design partner, Impel Studio, we have over 20 years of experience creating consumer products for major companies.

Our Supplier & Manufacturer

We partnered with a top insole manufacturer. They're an American company that's been around for over 80 years. They invented the lathe used for modern shoe insoles. And they've made high-quality insoles for some of the world’s top brands.

story:
There are dozens of personal water filters and filter bottles on the market that clean water by "trapping" bacteria and cysts. Many of them are slow, awkward to use and complicated. Unfortunately, bacteria trapped in a moist and sometimes warm environment of a water filter will continue to live and multiply creating its own water problem. But by far, the greatest limitation of water filters is that they do not eliminate or even trap waterborne VIRUSES that are really the biggest concern of all in drinking water.

Meet Pure2Go

pure2gopurifier.com


Meet Pure2Go, the most advanced, unique and multi-functional, true water purifier in the world. Pure2Go "kills"  waterborne bacteria and viruses instantly, ON CONTACT and ON DEMAND while also completely eliminating waterborne cysts such as Cryptosporidium and Giardia. With Pure2Go, there is no waiting time or preparation required. As contaminated water passes through, it is purified INSTANTLY without the holding time and procedures other true water purifiers require.   

Adaptive, Functional, Flexible

Pure2Go can be used by one person or multiple users. With its cleanable and replaceable insert cartridges, Pure2Gowill be used over and over again for many years or stored conveniently for potential emergencies and disasters. Replaceable cartridges provide 300 US gallons of purified water. 


How did we come up with this design?

Over nearly a half of century, Water One, Inc. and its affiliate companies Water One of SW Florida and CALCO, Ltd. have provided ultra pure water to science and industry, and premium bottled drinking water to customers throughout the world. An industry innovator in many respects, we developed a proprietary water purification media, ViroBac, that in over twenty eight years of independent testing has been proven to kill waterborne bacteria and viruses on contact and on demand. Utilizing ViroBac ,Water One, Inc., was the first company in the world to produce a US EPA registered water purifier, allowing us to sell our first and second generation drinking straw style purifiers to US and international customers, including all branches of the US Military.

Since that time, the need and requirements for personal water filters and purifiers has changed dramatically, driven by the growth of outdoor activities, adventure travel and emerging nations, as well as the needs of military, missionaries humanitarian services and disasters. Inspired by a meeting with the US Marine Corp., Water One of Southwest Florida was determined to meet their new requirements, marrying our water perfection experience with form and functionality and setting a new standard for hydrating on the go. After almost two years of research and development Pure2Go is ready to launch. 

Why Do We Need The Money?


Independent laboratory testing using ANSI/NSF and US EPA Protocol has already established that the Pure2Go Water Purifier with ViroBac:

  • "Kills" 99.9999% of waterborne bacteria
  • "Kills" 99.997% of waterborne viruses
  • Eliminates cysts such as Giardia & Crypto
  • Significantly reduces radioactive contaminants in water

To meet US Military requirements for water purifiers, Pure2Go must be tested and certified to NSF P248 standards, a certification that no water filter or hand held water purifier have ever achieved.  The cost of this certification and other ongoing testing will be substantial but ongoing testing will remain a key component of our global sales strategy further setting Pure2Go apart from competitors.  

Why is P2G Different, How Does It Work?

Pure2Go’s proprietary design uses two cleanable and replaceable insert cartridges to provide three tiers of filtration and purification. With a flow rate of up to 16 ounces of water per minute, (that’s over 7 gallons per hour) dirty water (non-saltwater) passes through an ultra filtration membrane cartridge and then flows into the ViroBac and carbon cartridge. Filtering makes the water clean and ViroBac purification ensures the water is completely safe to drink with no danger from any pathogens, Including Viruses. providing CLEAN, SAFE, GOOD TASTING WATER.

 Pure2Go Traveler's Kit

The Pure2Go Traveler’s Kit combines performance, portability and convenience in a compact, durable travel pouch that takes up minimal space in a suitcase or backpack. The 27 ounce collapsible source water bottle screws directly into the bottom of the Pure2Go providing safe, clean purified water for one or more people without any concern about cross contamination. Whether filling up from a hotel water tap in Central America, a contaminated lake or stream in India, or even a mud puddle in Haiti, the Pure2Go Travelers Kit ensures you will have safe, purified water anywhere you journey or adventure.

Pure2Go-Kit

The Pure2Go-Kit with its adaptable accessories is the most high performance, personal water purification system in the world. Like the Traveler’s Kit the Pure2Go-Kit includes a collapsible water bottle that can be used 3 different ways. The Go-Kt also contains a 2 liter, gravity feed, source water bag that will provide up to 16 ounces of water in one minute to supply the drinking and cooking needs for a family or group. The Pure2Go-Kit’s pump can supply source water directly through the Pure2Go, or to fill the collapsible bottle or 2 liter bag. The pump can also be used to rinse the Pure2Go with clean water before storing it. When used as an air pump it will pump up small tires, soccer balls and other inflatables such as pillows or air mattresses.

Another design feature of Pure2Go allows the purifier to be used in-line with hydration backpacks so that any water (non-saltwater) they are filled with can become purified water. The Pure2Go-Kit comes with 1/4" X 1/4" nylon hose connector allowing you to use your hydration backpack with or without Pure2Go.

Safe Water Immediately 

Whether its the Pure2G Traveler’s Kit or our multifunctional Pure2Go-Kit, Pure2Go is the only personal water purifier you will ever need. Killing bacteria and viruses on contact and on demand while eliminating waterborne cysts, Pure2Go ensures that you and the people you are with can always drink purified anywhere you are, anywhere you go and in any emergency from any non-saltwater source.

When used as an air pump it will pump up small tires, soccer balls and other inflatables such as pillows or air mattresses.


Another design feature of Pure2Go allows the purifier to be used in-line with hydration backpacks so that any water (non-saltwater) they are filled with can become purified water. The Pure2Go-Kit comes with 1/4" X 1/4" nylon hose connector allowing you to use your hydration backpack with or without Pure2Go.
Safe Water Immediately 
Whether its the Pure2G Traveler’s Kit or our multifunctional Pure2Go-Kit, Pure2Go is the only personal water purifier you will ever need. Killing bacteria and viruses on contact and on demand while eliminating waterborne cysts, Pure2Go ensures that you and the people you are with can always drink purified anywhere you are, anywhere you go and in any emergency from any non-saltwater source.

story:
Follow-up to The Live Fully 50

This year, I discovered that something remarkable happens when overwhelming grief is combined with the drive to accomplish a goal. Having lost my close friend Kathy to ovarian cancer in February, I wanted to hole myself up in my house and avoid anything I considered difficult (like interacting with people), but somewhere within I had just enough energy to run. It’s been a lifelong, familiar means of exercise for me. What seemingly little energy I had transformed into long, focused runs that had me mentally working through the memories of Kathy’s final days. I realized in order to function normally, I needed to get out there and move it.

For Kathy to die was a shock because she was very good at living. She would send me cards that said, “I’m so thankful to have you in my life,” and I knew she meant it. She filled her days with meaning by investing in people.

When someone you love has cancer, you might feel there is nothing you can do to make a real difference. The day I learned about Hello Gorgeous!, though, was when an opportunity presented itself to me. I simply visited their website and nominated Kathy for a makeover - and she was chosen! When we surprised her, she was walking to a meeting, looking tired and defeated. We’ll never forget how we saw her let out a heavy sigh. By the end of the day, Kathy’s funny, feisty personality had resurfaced as she bounced from guest to guest at her “reveal” luncheon following the makeover. She looked so polished and confident. Her makeup and new wig were so natural, enhancing her beauty. And her look was completed with a new outfit that she loved. Her special day was as much a gift to her loved ones as it was to her.

When Kathy died, I knew I had to channel my grief into something that gave me joy, as well as challenged me. When I think about Hello Gorgeous! it uplifts me. And I can’t think about Hello Gorgeous! without thinking about Kathy. I wanted to tell the world how these people made my friend feel so beautiful and adored. So, running for Hello Gorgeous! is what made sense to me. Running a distance that had mystified me after years of running marathons. 50 miles.



During my training, I felt close to Kathy because she didn’t know what her journey would look like, and neither did I. My challenge to myself to run 50 miles was a celebration of the gift of life and what people can do together to make life better for someone else. I knew I had the mental capacity to complete the challenge, but I couldn’t say with absolute certainty that I would finish. I was nervous. And I’m sure I was sometimes hard to be around because it was all I talked about. But taking this risk to help Hello Gorgeous!, and bringing people alongside me on the journey, was what brought me joy while I mourned.

Forty-seven days before my run, I made it public what I was doing, set a goal of raising $10,000, and I saw people give with such sincere generosity, my heart ached. A friend with an unemployed spouse and hospital bills gave what I thought was too much. But then I saw that this kind of generosity was sort of a trend. Countless people - some I’d never met - wanted to see my dreams come true. I heard stories of how cancer had touched their lives, how some of them knew women who had received a Hello Gorgeous! makeover, and from others, there was just sheer enthusiasm about my attempting to run 50 miles. In 47 days, any disenchantment I felt toward humankind fell away. I was humbled and awe-struck.

That support and encouragement carried me the entire distance. My feet felt lighter because of all the faces of loved ones I saw that day. I ran 50 miles, but the effort is a blur compared to the celebrating that happened leading up to, and on the day of, that monumental run.

My heart has been broken open and wide because of this experience. And I feel like it’s only a reflection of the generous hearts I’ve encountered. Last weekend at the Hello Gorgeous! annual luncheon, I was able to present them with a check for $17,049.24!

My life feels different since Kathy died. But I think I appreciate my life more because she wanted so much to survive. She lived fully, even in the darkest days, inspiring me to live that way too.


                                                                                                       -November 14, 2013

                                              __________________________


Why 50 Miles?

Because it's time to go big! My friend Kathy Gribbin courageously fought a three-year battle with ovarian cancer. A few months before she died, I nominated her for a surprise makeover from Hello Gorgeous! of HOPE, Inc., and she was selected. They want women with cancer to feel beautiful, feminine and reminded of how loved they are. Kathy was surprised at work with flowers and chocolate and a big, "Hello Gorgeous!" by friends and stylists from The Beehive, an affiliate salon in South Bend. She received a facial, a manicure and pedicure, makeup, a new wig and a beautiful outfit - as well as a "reveal" party where 35 of her friends greeted her with "Hello Gorgeous!" This organization helped us celebrate Kathy in a profound way, and she loved every minute of it. She died on February 6, 2013. I've thought so often about what Kathy's surprise makeover meant to her - and what it means to the other women like her. So it's time for me to reach beyond what I know I can do. I've run 15 marathons, but to celebrate Kathy's life in my own way, and to give back to Hello Gorgeous!, I really need to go further.

Beyond 50 Miles

My goal is to raise $10,000. Kim and Mike Becker, the founders of Hello Gorgeous!, owned a large full-service salon in South Bend for ten years before selling it and committing to their mission: "To provide complimentary, professional makeovers and cosmetic education to any women battling any cancer free of charge in our Mobile Day Spa and affiliate salons."

  • The average cost of a Gorgeous Visit is $700. (This doesn't include the cost of utilizing one of their Mobile Day Spas.)
  • The average cost to set up an affiliate salon for one year's worth of Gorgeous Visits is $5,000. Their goal is to foster two affiliate salons in every city in the U.S. so they can help at least 500,000 women each year.

Learn more about this incredible organization here: http://hellogorgeous.org/
 

At the Heart of the Training

Kathy and the founders of Hello Gorgeous! have demonstrated what it means to "Live Fully." That's why I'm inspired to make an impact by using what I hold dear - my love for running.

  • If you choose to donate, your gift will go directly to Hello Gorgeous! and you'll receive a tax deductible receipt.  
  • You'll also receive a unique perk in exchange for your gift! See column at right.
  • Let others know that this is important to you and share my link with them. Thank you!

story:
On August 17th, 2011 Katie McCall, a CA licensed midwife, was convicted of practicing medicine without a license for a 2007 birth she assisted as a midwifery student. She was arrested, charged, tried and convicted while holding her medical license in good standing and while having no complaints issued against her as a licensed professional. She has never lost a baby or harmed anyone while serving the over 1,000 birthing families she has served in midwifery care and education over the past ten years. She has never had a complaint filed by a family she has cared for. 
 
Her criminal charge arose from a home birth where her supervising midwife could not arrive because she was at another birth. Instead of leaving the family to birth unassisted, Katie stayed.  She recommended that the family transfer to the hospital and the family refused.  They were aware that she was only a student midwife and that she was unable to secure an overseeing midwife. The original complaint was made by a bystander and not by the family who chose to birth at home.

 

When the mother began to push, the baby got stuck in a condition called shoulder dystocia.  Using her training as a student, Katie performed the Gaskin maneuver to free the baby.  The maneuver was successful, however, the mother began to hemorrhage due to a partially retained placenta.  Again, using her training, Katie was able to stop the bleeding and protect the mother from harm.  She went on to get her license and was later arrested from her licensed midwife office and taken to jail. At trial, Katie argued through counsel that her practicing medicine was justified due to the emergency situations above. 

 

In most every state that recognizes out of hospital midwifery, Katie would not have been charged for refusing to abandon a woman who was birthing that refused a transport. But the state of California's legislation makes something as simple as palpating a pregnant belly or taking a blood pressure a felony.

 

Despite expert testimony from the Assistant Director of the Emergency Department at UCLA-Santa Monica and a renowned OB/GYN that Katies actions potentially saved two lives, a jury convicted her of one felony count of practicing medicine without a license at trial. Hundreds of letters were written in defense of Katie and the judge remarked that he had never seen so many people show support to a convicted criminal in his court room.

 

The Impact

On September 16, 2011, despite the fact that Katie has no prior criminal record of any sort, the judge upheld the felony conviction and sentenced Katie to 3 years probation and told her she cannot work as a midwife during that time. She was not given any time in prison or jail, but was instead given 280 hours of community service and $10,000 in restitution to the CA Medical Board, which was down from the $45,000 they were asking for to reimburse them for their investigation costs. This amount shocked even the judge, especially since the one birth was the only birth Katie was being tried for and the state of California is in such dire economic straits. Katie is unable to work in her profession during probation and the medical board will revoke her license as a result of the conviction. This is causing untold financial hardship on Katie, a single mother, and her two children, Christiana and Robert. She may never be allowed to be a midwife in CA again.

 

For further information, please take a moment to read what the media has had to say:http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/09/16/los-angeles-midwife-gets-_0_n_966558.html?ref=fb&src=sp&com 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We previously held an IndieGogo fundraiser and generous donors contributed and fully raised the amount needed for Katie's court ordered $10,000 restitution to the California Medical Board. In addition, $1,898 came in towards Katie's probation and court fees as well. This leaves only $4,222 left to raise before ALL of Katie's legal obligations are paid for.

 

Please consider contribuing toward this campaign. Katie's children have put together several levels of gifts/perks for your contributions. Let's join Katie's example of self sacrifice with gratitude. 


This campaign is being done only to raise money that will be paid directly and in full to the STATE of CALIFORNIA. If you'd like to donate to Katie to help with her living expenses as she has been barred from working in her field, you can donate directly to her paypal: kjenkinsart@hotmail.com OR you can email her at anaturalbirth@hotmail.com to ask for an address where you can mail a check.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially right now, you can still help! Below are three easy ways:

 

1. Make sure to pass this page on to friends, family, co-workers, political representatives, church or synagogue members, women's clubs, neighbors, facebook, twitter, bloggers etc.

 

2. Follow Katie as she blogs about doing her community service on Skid Row (http://supportmidwifekatiemccall.wordpress.com/)

story:
| Who we are |
 Informacio |
 What We Need |
 What You Get |
 F.A.Q. |

Fact: Health Literacy Saves Lives.

When people have access to information about their health and wellness, they are more equipped to make healthy decisions.  With advancements in mobile, touchscreen, and tablet technology, people are more informed than ever, with one notable exception: the doctor's office.

In many ways, going to a healthcare facility feels like visiting the past. The computers are outdated, and there's no good way for a patient to view the information that their doctors are inputting.  Despite all the great advances of the last few years, a lack of health literacy is still a devastating issue. It needs to be addressed multi-laterally: not just through the development of apps and dissemination of information, but in all related fields as well.   


Who are we, and what are we doing to help? 

We are a global team of designers, scientists, and entrepreneurs who have been motivated by personal frustrations with health-related information access.

Combining modern furniture design and information technology, our project develops integrated solutions that enhance healthcare settings for both the patient and clinician.

Meet Informacio. 

After 12 prototypes, our team has created a modern healthcare workstation that will easily accommodate users of various technical levels, allowing increased access to relevant medical information. With an eye to the future, these workstations will support future hardware and software, creating a seamless upgrade path for patient centers.

Informacio is designed to incorporate a 27-inch touchscreen table PC that can be used as a surface-level workstation, or rotated to an upright position (similar to a traditional computer). A keyboard and mouse are embedded inside, conserving space.

What We Need


Our fundraising goal is $30,000, which will allow us to build the final, functional prototype out of composite materials. Working with local manufacturers, we will ensure that the final prototype is produced on antimicrobial surfaces and meets our high level of standards. In producing our final prototype, we will be able to place Informacio in a clinic or primary care office and begin user testing. Here is a breakdown of how the funds will be spent:


What You Get

 While we are just a small team, we have partnered with like-minded businesses, not-for-profits, and educational institutions to provide some great rewards to our backers.  


$25: A custom 3D printed keychain from the 3D Printer Experience

Our friends at The 3D Printer Experience are helping bring back local manufacturing - and they are working with us to offer some amazing, customized gifts for our backers. For donating $25, you'll receive a custom 3D-printed keychain with your Twitter handle or business name on it!


$50: A 3D-printed iPhone case

At $50, all our backers can choose to have a custom-printed iPhone case emblazoned with their company name or Twitter handle.


$100: Live Webinar and Q&As with physicians, designers, and health care providers

 

Join us for a series of one-hour webinars with industry-leading physicians, modern designers, and urban healthcare providers. They will answer your questions in a live talkback session at the end of each webinar. At $100, you will gain access to one webinar of your choosing. For $250, we'll give you access to all three! 


$500: A 3D-printed, 3-inch model of Informacio

 

Show the world you support health literacy with a gorgeous 3-inch scale model of Informacio. Printed in laser-sintered nylon powder on a EOS FORMIGA P-110, this model belongs in an art gallery! Special thanks to Brad Kang and Bobby Zylstra of the South Side Hackers in Chicago for 3D modeling and assistance.


$1,000: A beautiful handmade wooden teabox from our partner bke designs

 

bke designs has been with us all the way, developing all 12 prototypes of Informacio in their 1920's-era woodshop in west Chicago. And their support doesn't end there - for those who have pledged $1,000 or more, you'll receive an elegant teabox made right here in Chicago (in addition to all our other gifts)!

$5,000: Become a pilot site for Informacio

Doctors and healthcare providers: with your generous pledge of $5,000, we will launch Informacio in your facility as a pilot site. Experience firsthand how modern furniture design can improve your patients' health literacy!



Who We Are

Vince Paglione is a Chicago-based educator and CEO of Polar Green, a company committed to improving health information and literacy systems for patients, physicians and the general public. Vince’s professional experience spans over 33 years in education, grants and working with designers. He was recognized by the American Institute of Architects in 2012 for their Distinguished Service Award.

Brian K. Ellison is an academically trained architect that has been designing furniture for residential and commercial spaces for the past 15 years. After spending two years in the Netherlands designing spaces and furniture both independently and under Faas van Dijk of OZENFANT, Ellison returned to Chicago and opened bke designs on Chicago's west side in 2008.

Marcio Dupont is an industrial designer, currently practicing in São Paulo, Brazil. He has 16 years of professional experience working abroad in the U.S., UK, México and Brazil. He has expertise in sustainability, Healthcare Design and accessibility with an in-depth knowledge of European, American and Latin-American design culture and markets.

Nick Bacon is a Virginia-raised, Chicago-based entrepreneur with a lifelong passion and track record for creating new tools to foster health and educational advancement.

Andrew Mausert-Mooney is a video producer and artist who, among other projects, has produced live webinars on health topics such as autism education.

Brenda Lopez Silva is a designer and technologist currently working in Chicago. She has been involved in research and development of learning technologies for use in formal and informal education settings. She has been involved in software development, design and interactive technologies.

Accurat is an information design agency. They design analytical tools and visual narratives that provide awareness, comprehension and engagement. Accurat provides clients with services and products that relate to information design, focusing on how information transforms networks, cultures, contexts and behaviors. Accurat was founded in 2011 by Giorgia Lupi, Simone Quadri and Gabriele Rossi. They have offices in Milan and New York.

F.A.Q.

 What is Health Literacy? Health literacy is the ability for an average person to understand everything that influences their health and wellness and make proper decisions based on that information. For example, it includes the ability to understand instructions on prescription drug bottles, appointment slips, medical education brochures, doctor's directions and consent forms, and the ability to negotiate complex health care systems. [source] 

How Do We Help Patients? The more patients can understand what is occurring in their bodies, the more they engage in the health care process. This workstation will facilitate better communication and collaboration between patients and providers, enabling a visually accessible approach when reviewing images, charts, and lab results. Electronic Health Records such as EPIC and Cerner can readily be displayed on Informacio. 


It will allow physicians to utilize touchscreen technology to draw, annotate and write notes onto CT Scans, MRIs, patient notes and other medical documentation records that need to be updated. This decreases time spent double-checking notes and reduces miscommunications. 


How Do We Help Doctors and Care Givers? Informacio's touchscreen and tablet technology will help to engage the patient in their care (as per Meaningful Use, Accountable Care Organization (ACO) regulations). The provider and the patient can easily view the details of the patient care on the large touchscreen. For providers who have not yet begun to update to modern technology, Informacio still offers the benefits of being able to share information with the patient in different display modes. Since the workstation supports multiple display formats and viewing angles, one workstation can accommodate various types of users - standing, sitting, or even bedridden. 


How Do We Help Hospitals, Institutions, and Healthcare Medical Facilities? It can become costly and frustrating for providers when they need to continually repurchase furniture to accommodate new technology. The flip side of that - not purchasing furniture that accommodates new technology - casts aside the advances in health literacy that that technology effects. With Informacio, repurchasing furniture will not have to occur as frequently. This prevents unnecessary expenses for the facilities. New and emerging technologies can easily be integrated into our workstation, including new versions of tablets, smart phones and other digital devices.

It needs to be addressed multi-laterally: not just through the development of apps and dissemination of information, but in all related fields as well.
  Who are we, and what are we doing to help? We are a global team of designers, scientists, and entrepreneurs who have been motivated by personal frustrations with health-related information access.
Combining modern furniture design and information technology, our project develops integrated solutions that enhance healthcare settings for both the patient and clinician.
Meet Informacio. After 12 prototypes, our team has created a modern healthcare workstation that will easily accommodate users of various technical levels, allowing increased access to relevant medical information. With an eye to the future, these workstations will support future hardware and software, creating a seamless upgrade path for patient centers.
Informacio is designed to incorporate a 27-inch touchscreen table PC that can be used as a surface-level workstation, or rotated to an upright position (similar to a traditional computer). A keyboard and mouse are embedded inside, conserving space.

What We Need

Our fundraising goal is $30,000, which will allow us to build the final, functional prototype out of composite materials. Working with local manufacturers, we will ensure that the final prototype is produced on antimicrobial surfaces and meets our high level of standards. In producing our final prototype, we will be able to place Informacio in a clinic or primary care office and begin user testing.

Here is a breakdown of how the funds will be spent:


What You Get
While we are just a small team, we have partnered with like-minded businesses, not-for-profits, and educational institutions to provide some great rewards to our backers.  $25: A custom 3D printed keychain from the 3D Printer Experience


Our friends at The 3D Printer Experience are helping bring back local manufacturing - and they are working with us to offer some amazing, customized gifts for our backers.  For donating $25, you'll receive a custom 3D-printed keychain with your Twitter handle or business name on it!


$50: A 3D-printed iPhone case


At $50, all our backers can choose to have a custom-printed iPhone case emblazoned with their company name or Twitter handle.

$100: Live Webinar and Q&As with physicians, designers, and health care providers

 Join us for a series of one-hour webinars with industry-leading physicians, modern designers, and urban healthcare providers.  They will answer your questions in a live talkback session at the end of each webinar.  At $100, you will gain access to one webinar of your choosing. For $250, we'll give you access to all three! $500: A 3D-printed, 3-inch model of Informacio


 Show the world you support health literacy with a gorgeous 3-inch scale model of Informacio.  Printed in laser-sintered nylon powder on a EOS FORMIGA P-110, this model belongs in an art gallery! Special thanks to Brad Kang and Bobby Zylstra of the South Side Hackers in Chicago for 3D modeling and assistance.

$1,000: A beautiful handmade wooden teabox from our partner bke designs


 bke designs has been with us all the way, developing all 12 prototypes of Informacio in their 1920's-era woodshop in west Chicago.  And their support doesn't end there - for those who have pledged $1,000 or more, you'll receive an elegant teabox made right here in Chicago (in addition to all our other gifts)!$5,000: Become a pilot site for Informacio

Doctors and healthcare providers: with your generous pledge of $5,000, we will launch Informacio in your facility as a pilot site. Experience firsthand how modern furniture design can improve your patients' health literacy!
Who We Are
Vince Paglione is a Chicago-based educator and CEO of Polar Green, a company committed to improving health information and literacy systems for patients, physicians and the general public. Vince’s professional experience spans over 33 years in education, grants and working with designers. He was recognized by the American Institute of Architects in 2012 for their Distinguished Service Award.
Brian K. Ellison is an academically trained architect that has been designing furniture for residential and commercial spaces for the past 15 years. After spending two years in the Netherlands designing spaces and furniture both independently and under Faas van Dijk of OZENFANT, Ellison returned to Chicago and opened bke designs on Chicago's west side in 2008.
Marcio Dupont is an industrial designer, currently practicing in São Paulo, Brazil. He has 16 years of professional experience working abroad in the U.S., UK, México and Brazil.  He has expertise in sustainability, Healthcare Design and accessibility with an in-depth knowledge of European, American and Latin-American design culture and markets. 
Nick Bacon is a Virginia-raised, Chicago-based entrepreneur with a lifelong passion and track record for creating new tools to foster health and educational advancement.
Andrew Mausert-Mooney is a video producer and artist who, among other projects, has produced live webinars on health topics such as autism education.
Brenda Lopez Silva is a designer and technologist currently working in Chicago. She has been involved in research and development of learning technologies for use in formal and informal education settings. She has been involved in software development, design and interactive technologies.
Accurat is an information design agency. They design analytical tools and visual narratives that provide awareness, comprehension and engagement. Accurat provides clients with services and products that relate to information design, focusing on how information transforms networks, cultures, contexts and behaviors. Accurat was founded in 2011 by Giorgia Lupi, Simone Quadri and Gabriele Rossi. They have offices in Milan and New York.
F.A.Q.
What is Health Literacy?
Health literacy is the ability for an average person to understand everything that influences their health and wellness and make proper decisions based on that information. For example, it includes the ability to understand instructions on prescription drug bottles, appointment slips, medical education brochures, doctor's directions and consent forms, and the ability to negotiate complex health care systems. [source] 

How Do We Help Patients?
The more patients can understand what is occurring in their bodies, the more they engage in the health care process. This workstation will facilitate better communication and collaboration between patients and providers, enabling a visually accessible approach when reviewing images, charts, and lab results. Electronic Health Records such as EPIC and Cerner can readily be displayed on Informacio. 

It will allow physicians to utilize touchscreen technology to draw, annotate and write notes onto CT Scans, MRIs, patient notes and other medical documentation records that need to be updated. This decreases time spent double-checking notes and reduces miscommunications. 

How Do We Help Doctors and Care Givers?
Informacio's touchscreen and tablet technology will help to engage the patient in their care (as per Meaningful Use, Accountable Care Organization (ACO) regulations). The provider and the patient can easily view the details of the patient care on the large touchscreen. For providers who have not yet begun to update to modern technology, Informacio still offers the benefits of being able to share information with the patient in different display modes. Since the workstation supports multiple display formats and viewing angles, one workstation can accommodate various types of users - standing, sitting, or even bedridden. 

How Do We Help Hospitals, Institutions, and Healthcare Medical Facilities?
It can become costly and frustrating for providers when they need to continually repurchase furniture to accommodate new technology. The flip side of that - not purchasing furniture that accommodates new technology - casts aside the advances in health literacy that that technology effects. With Informacio, repurchasing furniture will not have to occur as frequently. This prevents unnecessary expenses for the facilities. New and emerging technologies can easily be integrated into our workstation, including new versions of tablets, smart phones and other digital devices.

story:
ProHealth arises after the join of a group of IT professionals.

We have experience in healthcare integration and a very close relationship with medical professionals around us.

Our goal is to make the life of the medical professionals easier and contribute to make healthcare much more productive and handy.

After Performing an exhaustive analysis in the healthcare sector, we identified some areas where we can help to professionals and patients.

Offering to the patients a safe channel to their healthcare information, no matter where they are, and providing a safe communication channel between professionals, where they can share high sensitive documents to do their interconsultation in a more agile way

story:
Now that our campaign has ended, you can order online at www.CogniTea.com!

Check out what REAL people are saying!:

** CogniTea helped Darrell McTague run a sub-2 hour 1/2 marathon - Read his review, click here! **


What Is CogniTea?

CogniTea is an all-natural tea that helps promote mental clarity and focus.  It is made with a unique blend of teas, herbs, and 100 mg of L-Theanine, an amino acid extracted from green tea.

CogniTea is specifically crafted to help you be alert and energized while also being focused and centered. 

What people are saying:

"The mint is really good! I like how it's organic and all natural. Nice to have a means for caffeine and energy without a load of sugar and artificial ingredients!"  - Ryan D.

"I have to say it does the trick! Great for late afternoon slow time."  - Dave A.

"I came in caffeine free and tried CogniTea. The flavor was good, light and minty. The difference between my regular coffee high and this, was my that brain felt alert. I was not super wired but I felt able to plug on through the day. I will definitely drink it again."  - Rebecca L.

Background

Hello! I am Alex and like most of you, I have a lot going on.  Six months ago I started drinking a ton of coffee and energy drinks to keep me going.  I thought they would help me be productive, but instead they made me jittery, anxious, and irritated.  I couldn't focus, I wasn't sleeping well, and I always felt a little off.

So I set out to create something better and the result is CogniTea - a smarter, better option that gives you an energy that is actually useful.  We call it "Productive Energy."

What Makes CogniTea so Special?

  • CogniTea combines some of the most nutritious and impressive teas, herbs, and extracts from all around the world.  This combination is specifically crafted to help stimulate Alpha brain waves which promote:

L-Theanine is extracted from green tea and, in combination with the other ingredients, is proven to induce Alpha brain waves.  L-Theanine crosses the blood-brain barrier and increases GABA and dopamine levels in the brain. For more information on L-Theanine please click here.

  • We engineer these ingredients so they are more water soluble and bioavailable.  This helps the body absorb the nutrients quicker than if you were to steep these ingredients in their full form. 
  • We spent 3 months creating a new blending and manufacturing process from the ground up to successfully package it into a single, convenient teabag

Flavor & Ingredients

Note: Some of the above ingredients contain caffeine.  Also included is 100% Natural Tea Extract. Each serving of CogniTea contains 90 mg of caffeine, approximately the same as in an 8 oz cup of coffee.


Use of Funds

CogniTea is ready to go to market and we need your help to get there!  With your help, we will be able to accomplish the following:

  • First Production Run

A cost effective first production run will mean we can:

1. Purchase bulk ingredients;

2. Purchase custom heat sealable tea envelopes and tags; and therefore

3. Lower our fixed and variable costs!

  • Marketing and Distribution

Your funding will help in many ways:

1. We will increase our visibility through media, print, and e-commerce.  The more we promote, the more we grow.

2. We will be able to ramp up production so that we can meet the demands of large health and food retailers across the U.S. who share our vision.

3. We will create and sponsor tasting events to increase brand awareness at colleges, offices, gyms, and co-working spaces where the "I CAN. I WILL." spirit lives.

  • CogniTea ARP Challenge

At CogniTea we believe that Ambition, Resilience, and Persistence are the three keys to success. Our goal is to get behind the people who best exemplify these traits.  That is why CogniTea hopes to promote a competition to support entrepreneurs and dreamers.  The winners will receive prizes, mentors, and resources to help them achieve their goals.

Rewards

story:
So Here's The Deal...

My name is Mack Vargas, I'm a YouTuber and student in Canada. With school, myself and a few others will be shaving off all our hair to raise money for Cancer Care Manitoba! Any donation is appriciated and every donation counts!

What Happens If We Raise...

$50 - Pictures of the event will be posted on my channel including before and after photos of my haircut

$75 - I will vlog the event for the day as I go through the process of losing the hair and donating to cancer care.

More than $100 - You tell me! If we raise over $100 together then we will plan a special event for everyone who donates to this cause

My name is Mack Vargas, I'm a YouTuber and student in Canada. With school, myself and a few others will be shaving off all our hair to raise money for Cancer Care Manitoba! Any donation is appriciated and every donation counts!

$75 - I will vlog the event for the day as I go through the process of losing the hair and donating to cancer care.
More than $100 - You tell me! If we raise over $100 together then we will plan a special event for everyone who donates to this cause

story:
Please Help

Henry "The Sky" Oseagulu is a wonderful person, a talented tricker and an amazing friend. He has touched the lives of so many in such beautiful ways.  Recently he had an accident which left him with 18 stitches, multiple lacerations on his hand and a huge medical bill.  Unfortunately he has no insurance and cannot afford to pay.  This is a way for all the people who have met Henry (and those who have yet to meet him) to help him out.

story:
THANK YOU FOR VISITING OUR CAMPAIGN PAGE: 

My name is John Reaves. I am a rated 5th Dan Black Belt in the Kajukembo Kungfu Karate System under Sifu Don Nahoolewa of Honolulu, Hawaii.  I am 79 years young, and also the inventor  of the unique Patent Pending "CLOSE INDIVIDUAL DEFENSE DEVICE (C.I.D.D.)",, the first, and only in-line pepper spray device uniquely designed to be 'glovet'-mounted on the back of each hand (ala "Spiderman"), and remotely activated on the same hand by means of an extension lever .  This campaign has a  double purpose for its presentation: 1) To expose the false sense of safety and protection promoted by the ordinary pepper spray products currently on the market.   In a few words, they are very effective if they can hit the assailants eyes.   The problem is that the attacking predators don't follow the popularly expected, classical assumptions that the victim has been taught to expect - should they, themselves become a target victim.   Think about what would you do should you be attacked at this very minute.  It is an unfair question since no one can know the prior intentions of another person - even close friends and even relatives.   Even having a lethal weapon, such as a gun or knife, is no guarantee of safety, or survival before, during, or even after an encounter,   As a 79 year young, retired martial arts instructor, I prudently take many precautions,at home, and in the streets, to avoid as much as possible, becoming a victim of the increasingly random violence our economically impacted nation is currently experiencing.  I own several guns for protection.  But I can;t go around shooting people who I might casually encounter, just because they might attack me because they thought this 'old dude' might be an 'easy mark'.   I still have some 'neat tricks' that might painfully surprise them.   The element of surprise, in your favor,  is your best defense - if you don't panic.

                                                                                                                                 

NOTE:  Please see the "Gallery Section' for sequential illustrations of a typical assault..

                                           WHY YOU ARE AT RISK

According to the National Highway Transportation Administration (NHTA), rollovers account for more than 1/3 (37%), of all accidents worldwide, usually caused by old tire blow-outs and sudden loss of steering control - information most drivers never consider . Seat belts  have been the unrecognized cause of thousands of fatalities due to  entanglement, especially in cases where the belted occupants are upside-down, hanging from their seat belts - or unable to be reached by possible rescuers.  Further adding to the danger is the very real possibility of fire due to broken fuel lines.  It doesn't take imagination to see the potential horror of such situations because we are all aware of the daily reports of accident that fills daily news reports.  Paper insurance policies 'promises to 'fix your car' - if you survive the accident.  Paper insurances promises doesn't help you at the accident. 
                 TIRE INFORMATION 'THEY DON'T WANT YOU TO KNOW'

Factoid:  99% of the driving public are unaware that 'new' tires, even on that latest model car, can be over 8 years old since its manufacture.  And why is this information important for you and your loved ones?  Its just that tires chemically deteriorates and breaks down over time, even in unsold inventory, due to UV radiation.  The potential for a one-car, blowout accident is high for a sudden, catastrophic, heat-related tire failure, which is the cause of most accidents.   The "RIP-CORD" Emergency Seatbelt Cutter is the best "Insurance At The Accident".  

  YOU DECIDE THE PRIORITIES OF YOUR LIVES:  PLEASURE or SAFETY

"Why" is there a need for such a device?  We feel that this unique Patent Pending, life saving invention (which is projected to cost $45.00 - $65.00 per unit), will be recognized for solving a potential life-ending problem we sincerely hope you will never have to experience.   If you survive an accident, the PRIORITY is to get everyone away from the vehicle AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.   Since there are so many variables to accidents, another reason to have a "RIP-CORD" on each seat belt is that the driver may not be in a position to even help himself, or herself - but could be helped by other 'freed' passengers.  I have just given you a personal, logical reason why you should have the individual "RIP-CORD" Emergency Seatbelt Cutter  'prioritized'' on each seat belt - just in case. 

          HOW EACH UNIT WORKS TO SAVE LIVES IN AN ACCIDENT

Each unit is snap-mounted on each seat belt, and in time, will become an 'unnoticed',  passive "standby sentry" (like the seat belt) to rescue for as long as they are on the belts. The device is 'simple' in operation, requiring only the pull of one finger on an 'ejected' stowed "pull ring" which is activated by a bi-lateral force against each (occupied, belted), seatbelt.  Even the impact 'g-force' weight of a baby's car seat will activate the unit. Once activated, the unit immediately ejects a pull ring, which simultaneously causes a bright, flashing,  LED light to activate, which indicates the location of each (belted) passenger (in the dark) - so that none would be left behind.   The ejected pull ring offers the 'opportunity' to cut the seat belt by being pulled perpendicularly, internally (across) the seat belt.   An internal surgical steel blade instantly sever the threaded, 2.9 inch wide standard sea belt.  If there is no need to cut the seat belt, the pull ring would simply be pushed back inside the unit and reset for a 'possible' next event where it might be needed.  Changing cars? Simply remove each individual unit, using the special supplied tool, and mount them on the seat belts in the new car.

                                                               

                                       THE REAL 'PRIORITY' COMPARISON

 As I write this update, the campaign has less than seven days of life.  We  know that many more lives could be saved if we could eliminate the fear of entanglement  from the equation.   We covet your support in this lifesaving safety effort, even at this late hour, which is why every one who supports us at each level will receive at least one unit for the driver.  Benefits: This simple product will save lives - possibly your own.  Then, once away from the accident, when everyone is safe (hopefully), you can use that $725.00 "smart phone" to call for help - or 'stew' in your regret for not taking advantage to prepare for a clear and present danger your family faces every time you drive your car, IN FAVOR OF ELECTRONIC 'TOYS'.  THE TRUTH STANDS FOR ITSELF - THERE SHOULD BE PRIORITIES.   This product is about self-preservation of you and your family in a (possible) crisis situation. This is the one product, like paper insurance, that  you don't need until you need it, then you'll be glad you have it.   Noah didnt wait for the rain to fall before starting to build the Ark.  Remember, the American-made "RIP-CORD" Emergency Seatbelt Cutter is the best (and least expensive) "Insurance At The Accident". 

                   ANOTHER REASON WHY WE ASK FOR YOUR SUPPORT 

We need funds to launch a 'buckle-up'  publicity seatbelt campaign, and build a demonstration device for the simulation of different escape techniques using the "RIP-CORD"  to remove the fear of entanglement.  We feel this campaign will be more effective than anything that has been offered before , since we uniquely offer each belted passenger an on-board device to enable an 'E.S.C.ape' from that (possible) deadly restraint.  Unlike giving for a general 'feel good' social cause, buying that must-have newest cell phone, or latest 'game', your support could be a direct reason for a life being saved  -  possibly your own.  We will honor all campaign perks to the end of this campaign, it's not too late.

Should we ultimately fail to reach our campaign goal, which seems likely at this point, we will resubmit an unpgraded campaign version at a later date - but will wonder how many lives may have been lost in the meantime, due to non response.  Thanks for your support, !  Talk it up!   Johnny out.
